channel.title: ★ Blackbarrage ★ Start Your Adventure Here ★
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/en7s3.png[/img] Client Download Click HERE [spoiler]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/jopgn9kiqfjbhz0/Blackbarragersps.jar?dl=0[/spoiler] Features On Blackbarrage! - Starter Packs (Coins , Armor , Etc.. - Loyalty Points (Auras - Custom yell titles - Rusty coins - Crystal Chest - Squeal of Fortune - Vote For Spins - Forums - Friends List - Friend Chat - Private Chat - Commands - Skill Capes - Donator Area - Completionist Cape and Max cape and 200m Capes - Report Abuse - 100% Soulwars working like RuneScape! - Item Lending working 100% - Dragonfire Shield with Special Attack! - Godwars with Killcount Needed to pass to next stage! - Flowering & Dicing for Hosting Gambling - Pest Control - Custom Dungeoneering System - Recipe for Disaster - Dominion Tower with Dominion. - Duel Arena - Glacors with Working Minions & Double HP Bars - Teleport Hub System (Talk to Tree to Teleport Around) - All Bosses with good Drop Rates - Server Notified when Users get a good Drop - Squeal Of Fortune Working 100% Like RuneScape Showing Bought, Earned & Daily Spins. - Warrior Guild with Defender Drops - Castle Wars working exactly like RuneScape - Nice ways to make money - Much much more come online to find out more! - Fight Caves (63 Waves) - Fight Kiln (36 Waves) - Grand Exchange - Clan Chat System - Dungeoneering - Working Notes -Full Godwars- Bandos, Sara, Nex, Etc -30+ Bosses -15+ Minigames -RuneSpan Added -Soqual of Fortune 100% -100% Clan Wars -Working Anti-Dupe System -Fairy Rings working -lodestone 100%
Dungeons - Kuradal’s Dungeon - Edgeville Dungeon - Karamja Dungeon - Brimhaven Dungeon - Taverley Dungeon
Bosses - Kalphite Queen - King Black Dragon - Queen Black Dragon - God Wars - Barrows - Corp (Working Drops) - Kalphite queen - Tormented demons (Dragon claws) - Bork - Barrelchests - Dagannoth kings
Minigames - Duel Arena - Soul wars - Fight Kiln - Pest Control - Barrows - Recipe for Disaster - Real Dungeoneering (Just like Runescape!) - Fight Kiln - Castle Wars - RuneSpan - Fight Caves - Dominion Tower - Warriors Guild
Melee - Bronze, Iron, Steel, Black, Mithril, Adamant, Rune Armour & Weapons - All Dragon Weapons - Full Dragon Armour Set - Barrows Weapons/Armour Sets - God Weapons/Armour Sets - Chaotic Weapons - Defenders
Prayer - All Prayers - Gilded Altar - Auto Prayer (Click on Bone Click on Alter does it on its own
Training Teleports - Rock Crabs - Black Demons - Armoured Zombies - Yaks - Mature Grotworms [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/6z33vr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/v6ktqe.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/1zmcujb.png[/img]
